full_summary:
#  Oxygen and Firefighting Equipment Services

## Synopsis

Transport Canada's Aircraft Service Directorate (ASD) is seeking repair and overhaul services from original equipment manufacturers (OEM) or OEM-authorized facilities. The requirements pertain to oxygen and firefighting equipment on aircraft operated or maintained by Transport Canada. The subsequent contract will cover repairs, overhauls, modifications, and advanced exchanges over a 24-month period. Bidders must demonstrate compliance with relevant sections of the tender and meet specific criteria for repair and overhaul facilities.

## Criteria for Selection

To be eligible, bidders must meet the following conditions:

*   Be an approved repair and overhaul facility for the specified equipment
*   Hold Transport Canada approval as a maintenance organization (MO) or a Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) approved repair station

## Evaluation Criteria

The bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for contract award. Trade agreements, including the World Trade Organization (WTO) Agreement on Government Procurement (GPA), will be respected in this tender.

## Tender Details

*   **Contracting Entity:** Transport Canada
*   **Tender Reference Number:** CB-7270-9387018
*   **Closing Date:** 14:00 08 August 2023
*   **Publication Date:** 14 July 2023
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Traditional
*   **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
*   **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
*   **Trade Agreements:** WTO GPA, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, and other agreements

## Tender Documents

The tender documents can be found at [Canada Buy Service](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7270/eng_o2_firequip_rfp_r_o_1.pdf,https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7270/eng_o2_firequip_rfp_r_o.pdf,https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7270/fr_o2_equip_prot_inc_ddp_r_r.pdf).
